message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be worth every penny to you. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm looking to save as much as I can, and I'm not sure if your product is worth the full price you're asking.

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm happy to negotiate. However, $9000 is too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $10500. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, $10500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $10000 for the product. I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
